mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.station_name AS "stationName", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.office_name AS "officeName", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.technician_num AS "technicianNum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_skill_info( id, station_id, station_name, office_id, office_name, name, code, technician_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{stationId}, #{stationName}, #{officeId}, #{officeName}, #{name}, #{code}, #{technicianNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.station_name AS "stationName", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.office_name AS "officeName", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.technician_num AS "technicianNum"
mapper.select: select a.id,a.technician_id AS technicianId,a.technician_name AS technicianName, b.tech_sex AS techSex, b.tech_station_id AS techStationId,b.tech_station_name AS techStationName, c.img_url AS imgUrl from ser_skill_technician a LEFT JOIN service_technician_info b ON a.technician_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN service_technician_images c ON a.technician_id = c.tech_id AND c.del_flag = '0' AND c.img_type = '1' where a.skill_id=#{reqId} and a.del_flag = '0'
select id, item_id AS itemId,item_name AS itemName, item_id AS reqId from ser_skill_item where skill_id=#{reqId} and del_flag = '0'
select id, commodity_id AS commodityId,commodity_name AS commodityName from ser_skill_item_commodity where item_id=#{reqId} and del_flag = '0'
select id as commodityId,name as commodityName from ser_item_commodity where item_id=#{reqId}
select a.id , a.name as name from service_station a where del_flag = '0'
